name: MEC Centaurus -18C Sleeping Bag - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Get out for some exploring without spending your entire budget on gear. The Centaurus line uses quick-drying synthetic insulation for both value and reliable performance. Synthetics maintain consistent warmth even in damp conditions. Designed with thoughtful touches, it will make your nights better and keep your pack slim and light if you're going to carry it to the campsite. There's a zippered pocket on the draft tube, a 3/4-length zip and 2 loops that let you hang it to dry or air out in the morning.Insulated with Polyester HyperLoft  that contains recycled fibres.A combination of shingled and off-set quilted insulation ensures that there are no cold spots.Outer shell fabric is Pertex Quantum nylon with a DWR treatment to shed moisture. Lining is nylon.Hood drawcord is operable with one hand.Full draft collar and yoke at the neck and a draft tube behind the zipper keep heat in and cold out.Pocket on the draft tube has a 15cm  invisible zipper, fits glasses or a headlamp.3/4-length #8 YKK® zipper helps trim the weight.2 hanging loops on the foot end.Stuff sack and home storage sack included.

        Sustainability
